title: Lenovo Yoga 9i (2022) review: The new best consumer laptop
content:
I review a lot of laptops, and if you’ve heard of it, it’s probably crossed my desk. So when I say that the Lenovo Yoga 9i is now the best laptop on the market, I’m saying that from a place where I’ve actually tested the rest. The only caveat is that Dell hasn’t announced this

The post Lenovo Yoga 9i (2022) review: The new best consumer laptop appeared first on XDA.
description: Lenovo's Yoga 9i for 2022 is our new favorite laptop, with a clean yet pretty design, an OLED display, 12th-gen CPUs, and more.
